summary: Tony (Ulrich Thomsen) is angry and wants his money back after watching world-famous director, Claus Volter's (Nikolaj Lie Kaas) new film. Tony just got out of prison for violent behavior.
cast: Ulrich Thomsen|Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Mille Dinesen|Line Kruse|Kristian Halken|Nicolaj Kopernikus|Jakob Cedergren|Lars Brygmann|Niels Olsen|Peter Mygind|Ellen Hillingsø|Michael Carøe|Christian Heldbo Wienberg|Frederikke Thomassen|Lars Ranthe|Mette Agnete Horn|Preben Kristensen|Michael Asmussen|Ole Lemmeke|Mikkel Vadsholt|Helge Scheuer|Marie Caroline Schjeldal|Benedicte Balling|Nicolai Villum Jensen|Lykke Sand|Kjeld Nørgaard|Dan Schlosser|Stephanie Leon|Anette Støvelbæk|Joachim Knop|Hans Pilgaard|Caroline Boserup|Tomas Villum Jensen|Uffe Holm|Allan Olsen|Peter Reichhardt|Søren Frellesen|Ditlev Arne Ulrichsen|Anne O. Pagh|Poul Thomsen|Jacob Brick|Johanna Brüel|Henrik Clemmensen-Nielsen|Dan Hemmje|Ronni Husmand|Michael Larsen|David Petersen|David Schack Trappaud
title: Sprængfarlig bombe
